metadata.title: CVE-2022-23501 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TYPO3 is an open source PHP based web content management system. Inversions prior to 8.7.49, 9.5.38, 10.4.33, 11.5.20, and 12.1.1 TYPO3 isvulnerable to Improper Authentication. Restricting frontend login tospecific users, organized in different storage folders (partitions), can bebypassed. A potential attacker might use this ambiguity in usernames to getaccess to a different account - however, credentials must be known to theadversary. This issue is patched in versions 8.7.49 ELTS, 9.5.38 ELTS,10.4.33, 11.5.20, 12.1.1.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
